name: Zakti Prime
description: A thousand pains, before their end.

languages.description: Eintausend Schmerzen, bevor das Ende kommt.
languages.name: Zakti Prime

languages.description: Mille dolori, prima della loro fine.
languages.name: Zakti Prime

languages.description: 상대의 목숨이 끊기기 전까지 천 번의 고통을 줍니다.
languages.name: 자크티 프라임

languages.description: Mil sufrimientos, antes de su fin.
languages.name: Zakti Prime

languages.description: （英文：ZAKTI PRIME）在他们临终之前，使其受尽千般痛苦。
languages.name: 毒芽 Prime

languages.description: Тысяча болей будет прелюдией их конца.
languages.name: Закти Прайм

languages.description: Milhares de dores, que precedem o fim deles.
languages.name: Zakti Prime

languages.description: （英文：ZAKTI PRIME）至他們臨終前，受盡千刀萬刮。
languages.name: 毒芽 Prime

languages.description: สร้างความเจ็บปวดนับพัน ก่อนที่พวกมันจะพบจุดจบ
languages.name: Zakti Prime

languages.description: Sonları gelmeden önce bin tane ızdırap.
languages.name: Zakti Prime

languages.description: Пістолет, що завдасть ворогові тисячі страждань за мить, перш ніж убити.
languages.name: Закті-прайм
